nodes.text: The loirbnigg was a non-sentient, reptilian species native to Frisal, a reserve planet for wealthy Imperial families. There, the eight-legged creature was bred and trained as a riding animal. They were ridden by youth of the Atrisian noble families, such as Villis Andal, who later became the Imperial Moff of the Elrood sector.
John Terra created the loirbnigg for Planets of the Galaxy, Volume Three, published by West End Games in 1993.
